Ice::
 She could tell that he was following the predacon protocal for 
addressing thier officers.  She frowned and spoke openly. "Razor 
Claw, please, call me Ice. I won't mind. We are more than comrads in 
arms, we are friends. I trust you with my life. I hope that one day, 
you'll trust me."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw only had one response to Ice's intrusion. "Yes Mam." he 
called
> with the astute of a warrior. "I'm glad you have such faith in me 
mam." He
> was wary of using names, the Predacon ranks had punishment for 
using names
> instead of titles. He sat back wary of Ice's powers, she could read 
his mind
> so she knew about Predacon Protocalls.
>
